item.title: Pyenv安装及使用国内源安装
item.author: Author
item.description: 使用版本为 centos 如果使用Mac os 将bashrc 替换成bash_profile 安装依赖 sudo yum install zlib-devel bzip2-devel openssl-devel ncurses-devel sqlite-devel readline-devel tk-devel gdbm-devel libpcap-devel xz-devel 安装pyenv mkdir ~/.pyenv git clone git://github.com/yyuu/pyenv.git ~/.pyenv echo 'export PYENV_ROOT="$HOME/.pyenv"' >>
